verbs.description: [ARG1: some lodi homeowners] [V: annoyed] [ARG0: by vacation rentals in their neighborhoods] nancy mirko has owned her lodi home nearly 50 years but in may she says a home a few doors down suddenly became a weekend vacation rental for weddings graduations and more it the noise the cussing the drinking the cars steve jordan nancy mirko calif president and ceo lodi airbnb nancy beckman facebook kubrat lodi conference and visitors bureau kurt lodi california
